articles.author: Aleszu Bajak and Joe Sneve, USA TODAY
articles.title: What vaccination rates in rural America tell us about the advent of COVID vaccines - USA TODAY
articles.description: A USA TODAY analysis found hundreds of rural counties with only limited immunization against seasonal flu.
